summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Polish financial advisor website. All core functionality working correctly including homepage, navigation, blog, booking system, and contact forms.

design_issues.issue: Search for 'inwestowanie' returned 0 results - may be case-sensitive or exact match required

passed_tests: All 12 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, CTAs, and service cards
Navigation menu works - all links navigate correctly
Blog page loads articles, category filtering works
Booking system - calendar, date/time selection, form submission works
Contact form submission works with success message
All pages load correctly on mobile devices
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
